entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1700 metres. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level 1700 metres. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
